testcase.name: I Nav To Takealot.com Home Page
I click login in header
I should be in login screen, I enter credentials and login
I should be on the home screen
I enter the search term in the header
I should be in the product listing page
I click on a product in the product listing page
I should be on the product display page
I add the item to cart
I click on the go to cart button
I should be on the Cart page
I click on the proceed to checkout button
I should be on the delivery methods page
I click on the deliver my order option
I should be on the delivery addresses page
I click on the continue button in the delivery addresses page
I should be on the delivery options page
I click on the continue button in the delivery options page
I should see the beautiful gate pop up
I click donate on the beautiful gate pop up
I should be on the payment methods page
I click on the pay with credit card option
I should see the credit card form
I click on the Takealot logo in the header
I click on Orders Link in the header
I should be on the Order Tracking page
I click on the first order item
I should see the Order details
I validate that the order was created and is awaiting payment
I click cancel button
The order should be cancelled successfully
